snippet: In an unscheduled visit to the Federal Emergency Management Agency, President Obama challenged Speaker John A. Boehner’s claim that he does not have enough votes in the House to pass a measure to finance the government.
abstract: In an unscheduled visit to the Federal Emergency Management Agency, President Obama challenged Speaker John A. Boehner’s claim that he does not have enough votes in the House to pass a measure to finance the government.

headline.main: Obama Challenges Boehner on Budget Vote
